subject: [Mhln] Photoshop CS3 Extended $89
body:
America, where people do not inquire of a stranger, ''What is he?'' But ''What can he do?''
I would rather take hellebore than spend a conversation with a good, little man.
Bad weather always looks worse through a window.
Discipline is not a nasty word.
Feedback is the breakfast of champions.
In art there are tears that lie too deep for thought.
For as one star another far exceeds, So souls in heaven are placed by their deeds.
We don't see things as they are, we see things as we are.
You cannot shake hands with a clenched fist.
The right name is an advertisement in itself.
The advice that is wanted is commonly not welcome and that which is not wanted, evidently an effrontery.
Never claim as a right what you can ask as a favor.
The better I know men the more I admire dogs.
If moderation is a fault, then indifference is a crime.
Concentrate your strengths against your competitor's relative weaknesses.
There is nothing more likely to start disagreement among people or countries than an agreement.
Education costs money, but then so does ignorance.
Aviation is proof that given, the will, we have the capacity to achieve the impossible.
That which makes people dissatisfied with their condition, is the chimerical idea they form of the happiness of others.
